thread.title: Deutsche Bank seeks new CEO - sources

title: Deutsche Bank seeks new CEO - sources
text:
Deutsche Bank seeks new CEO - sources Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:43 
Deutsche Bank has begun the search for a new chief executive, two people familiar with the matter said on Tuesday, as investors grow frustrated with the slow turnaround of the loss-making German lender. Kate King reports
